mainHero.title: Code for
mainHero.subtitle: Singapore.
mainHero.description: Behind the ones and zeros, there's a heart that builds with purpose.

items.title: Build for Good
items.description: Always ideating, always solving — we code with purpose for the people. With empathy at our core, we build for the elderly, the vulnerable, and those often left behind. This is software for social good, rooted in Singapore's communities. We don’t just build apps — we build hope, access, and opportunity.

items.title: From Code to Community
items.description: We create inclusive technology that uplifts the underserved in Singapore — from seniors to everyday citizens. Our tools are crafted for real needs, with real people in mind. By combining thoughtful code with local action, we aim to drive meaningful change. This is tech that matters.

projects.title: Latest & greatest
projects.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
projects.description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
